name: InjuryToOpticNerveAndPathways
title: Injury to Optic Nerve and Pathways
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a diagnosis of injury to optic nerve and optic pathways.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a diagnosis of injuries to optic nerve, optic chiasm, optic tract, optic pathways and optic visual cortex.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that pertain to 'unspecified eye.')
